mapper.insert:
insert into flx_reim_reg_info_d(MDTRT_EVT_ID, SETL_ID, PSN_NO, PSN_INSU_RLTS_ID, PSN_NAME, PSN_CERT_TYPE, CERTNO, GEND, BRDY, INSU_OPTINS, INSUTYPE, PSN_TYPE, SP_PSN_TYPE, SP_PSN_TYPE_LV, CLCT_GRDE, EMP_NO, EMP_NAME, EMP_TYPE, ECON_TYPE, AFIL_INDU, AFIL_RLTS, EMP_MGT_TYPE, DCLA_REA, FIXMEDINS_CODE, FIXMEDINS_NAME, MED_TYPE, BEGNTIME, ENDTIME, CONER_NAME, TEL, ATT_VAL, SUMFEE, INSCP_SCP_AMT, FUND_PAY_SUMAMT, BANKCODE, BANK_TYPE_CODE, BANKACCT, ACCTNAME, BANK_SAMECITY_OUT_FLAG, MEMO, VALI_FLAG, RID, UPDT_TIME, CRTER, CRTER_NAME, CRTE_TIME, CRTE_OPTINS, OPTER, OPTER_NAME, OPT_TIME, OPTINS, POOLAREA) values
(#{item.mdtrtEvtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.setlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.psnNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.psnInsuRltsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.psnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.psnCertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.certno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.gend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.brdy,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.insuOptins,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.insutype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.psnType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.spPsnType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.spPsnTypeLv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.clctGrde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.empNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.empType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.econType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.afilIndu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.afilRlts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.empMgtType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dclaRea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fixmedinsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fixmedinsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.medType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.begntime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.conerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.attVal,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.sumfee,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.inscpScpAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.fundPaySumamt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.bankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bankTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bankacct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.acctname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bankSamecityOutFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.valiFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.rid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.crter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.crterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.crteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.crteOptins,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.opter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.opterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.optTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.optins,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.poolarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
